values:
Ill miss you_!
wont be able to update 
for about 4 days!


   please call me 
   <3          <3

ohh man its been quite a while!!!!!!!
 Well this weekend was good =)
 Ive spent every weekend for the past..oh 4 weeks
 with My lover -timothy- <33 
"things are looking pretty serious,
we chat online everyday for like 3 hours"  =)=)

Saturday afternoon sucked >=| i was supposed to
get a car, so my dad calls the guy to say hey were coming
to buy the thing and the guy doesnt answer..so we drive
by and the car was gone..so my dad calls once more
& this time he answers but it wasnt something i wanted
to hear___ He sold the car 5 minutes b4 we called him !! errrrr
fucking A. i was so mad;; it was a nice car too 

  Same thing happened friday..went to go purchase an 01 grand am..what does the
  guy tell us when we walk in, "nope sorry we just sold it" 
   fuck off. 
   ill ride my bike.

But im happy that i only have to attend school
for 1 day this week. Vacations with my mother = thee best.   sortof.

And friday, the day i effing dread...is my court date..super.
     theres no way in hell im going to have a 9pm curfew. thanks =)

i miss friends.
<3 how everyone used to hang out and always want to do things.
   or randomly call just to talk or go for a night out.
    i miss summer also. this 70 degree weather in april is just teasing,
     because..in about a week its gunna rain like a bitch. 

Ive been really emotional lately and i dont know why?
  help-? who knows.
  i guess im just looking for so much more.
  life is strange.

mk bye.




                                        Please  know  we  do  this 
                                              cause  we  care <3
                                        and  not  for  the  thrill.

Its def. been a while since ive wrote in this piece.
Schools been okay for once.
skipping connections and going
on exciting quests ;)

Last night i went to flint
to see timothy. <3333
but i had to leave at 10pm..
which was..heartbreaking !

and im pissed cause im sitting here at 9 am..
because my boss called and said i dindt have to come in
until 10 today...so i could have gotten an extra hour of sleep.
fuck work.
i quit.


and things are looking good for the next few weeks
with my little..ticket i was issued last thursday.
srgt. gillmore gillman whatever the hell his name is
didnt issue a real ticket <33. thanks dude.


and tonite i hope i get to hang with my girls
cuz i feeel like going to get drunk.. ha!
                     mk. enough said
                         byeee. x0-

ps i heart u T. johnson.

I dont want break to end
   its already saturday
  and im soo not ready for
   this shit!!! =)


working sucks ass too
__________!!!!!

Last nite was =)=)=) 
 Alecia we def. reunited the guys. ;) 
they love eachother <33
Putt-putt and pizza hut!
good times kids*
            




   I <3 timothy













k, bye! xooxoxoxoxxooo

WELL,

Today was much more eventful 
than the rest .. but it seems everyday
i come close to dieing
like..almost getting hit by a semi 
while running down pinco road.
i think its bound to happen one day.

  ill just..wait patiently =)

and i cant get over how retardly stupid some of the
mooood icons are!! 
I neeed to quit typing 
this is much for me
plus getting up at 6 am
doesnt help, especially on break.
but its to go see my booo in flint <3 
so wtfff. 

night  gorgeous
xxxxoooooxxxooo

So its tuesday , and theres nothing to doo <3

   _ps. thanks to lacie and rachel, 
    i now can enjot the lamejournal
     world ! =)  LOVE love LoVe.

Spring break hasnt been so bad,
considering i have the court home
 to look forward to...grand

and, i get to spend the entire end of my vacation
with timothy <3. thatll make things better_!

the higlight of my day...
me and rachel driving around standish
with my mothers extreme bass .
owe, and dying my hair
which again isnt that notice-able

    next time im gunna go for a neon orange
     er sumthing...that will...make a statement..? =)


oh, id like to share my -brush with death- experience 
on I75 monday morning.
me driving, paying attention to the radio not the road;
and i look up and..im in the grass..cool
so i swerrrv to the right and the car about rolls
swerv to the left..that doesnt help
so i decide to slam in the brakes...
with about 5 cars behind me , shitting their pants
but!! we lived..thank you, Jesus.



mk , sometimes..writing to yourself
gives me the creeps?
so, ttfn.


OH PSS CHECK OUT MY MOOD ICON
MENTALLY HANDICAPPED???
i'd say but i love it <33
reminds me of daniel
mcman

Girls night w/ Alecia and Rach;)
aka--Shippa and HiPpa!!
